about_the_game:
🌆 Welcome to Gang City! A metropolis where gang wars rage, corruption is rampant, and the vices of capitalism are fully unleashed. 🕴️

Gangs of the Street is an open-world, sandbox, realistic gangster game.

Fight to the top of the city and lead the Montana gang to victory.
Experience a realistic witness and justice system: Be careful when committing a crime, and ensure no witness sees you. If you're caught and there are witnesses to your crimes, you'll face fines and potential prison time. You can hire a lawyer to reduce your fines.

Realistic dying system: If you die or spend too many years in prison, you must start over with a new character, losing all money and rank in the gang.

Climb the hierarchy of your gang: Start as a member and work for higher-ranked gang members. Rise in the hierarchy to gain power, access better weapons, recruit stronger members, and unlock special missions and abilities.

Realistic police system: If witnesses see you, the police will be alerted and launch a full investigation. The more crimes you commit, the more scrutiny you'll face. Escape the crime scene quickly, or the police will arrive, increasing your wanted level. Your gang's hideouts may also be targeted if you or your members commit crimes.

Money laundering system: Earn dirty money from illegal activities, which you must launder to access real money.
Economy system: Use clean money to buy real estate and businesses, and pay influential people to assist you.
🇮🇹 The Montanas - Suave Italians thriving in luxury, ruling from a palace filled with games and intrigue.
🇷🇺 La Bratva - A formidable force from the cold, operating from an ex-military base, and feared for their fierce firepower.

🔥 Gameplay Highlight 🔥: Rise in power, acquire nightclubs, bars, homes, and legitimate businesses. But remember, death means starting over.

💼 Meet the City's Elite:

👤 The Businessman - The wealthiest in town, an ally or enemy? His mysterious dealings are legendary.
🏦 The Corrupt Bankers - Luxurious and sly, they are friends to every gang. For money laundering, they are your go-to.
🚓 The Corrupt Police Chief - Often found at the Montanas' casino palace, this law officer might be on your side... for the right price.

content_descriptors.notes:
We do not glorify the gangster lifestyle, drugs etc...

In this game there is violence, drug, drug trafficking, gang wars, racket.
